locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Clean shower, good water pressure.

Got here at 1300, 3 hour wait for a shower so I decided to grab one at 0100 before I left.  Still no showers available.  So let me check the reviews, oh....... There seems to be a pattern here.  Releave your current management at this ‚Ä¶

I entered my shower to see what looked like blood on the toilet. As I grabbed gloves to clean it. An employee said, "Don't I'll get someone to do that". As he did, I could over hear him tell the employee that he needed to clean a toilet ‚Ä¶

Waited two hours for shower after app said I was next, walked in and watched all the showers sit there empty but not cleaned yet for over an hour. No coffee, decaf only as the lady gets an attitude that she is only one of two people there ‚Ä¶
Cleaning showers requires you to disinfect and whip things like the sink, toilet and shower. Don't just empty the trash and remove the towels..

Wanted to grab a shower. First thing I see when I open the door is that the toilet is covered in shit and piss. Hair of various types all over the floor in and out of the shower, as well as clogging up the sink. Full little trash can. Fan ‚Ä¶
1 hr wait for the shower, employees here just chit chat , they dont want to clean the shower

Good luck getting a shower here. 24 guests in line. 1 person cleaning them. Place is FILTHY. Inside and out. I got here at 1pm on a Sunday. Parking was packed. 2 empty free  spots left. Mens room is abhorrent. I walked in and turned around ‚Ä¶

The store is nice and newly remodeled. Unfortunately tried to get a shower only to be told the showers have been out of order for a week. As expensive as the showers at these places, you'd think they'd have a plumber on standby with Golden ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ My shower had power washer pressure,nice. The room was clean and attendant friendly and helpful. ‚Ä¶

6/16Great employees. Did not use shower but management was refreshingly friendly. Clean area. Food looked fresh and tasted fresh too. Denny's here too. Lot was big and easy to maneuver arounf

showerReviews.reviewText: Great shower, I am disabled so we got the handicapped shower but there is no shower chair in the shower. I can not stand long due to my disability.  clean store, restaurant is small no salad bar, the food was great, only issue was paying ‚Ä¶

I rarely shower at Petro and have avoided TA Travel Centers, but since I had a shower credit, I decided to use it. To my surprise, shower 2 was spotless and sparkling. The older gentleman cleaning all the showers was working hard, which I ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ The only reason they stay in business is because of the lack of choice in parking and they have a shower.
